description: a(n) = sum_{ d | n } phi(lcm(d,n/d)), where phi(n) = Euler totient A000010.
maple: A061884 := proc(n) local b,d: b := 0; for d from 1 to n do if irem(n,d)=0 then b := b+phi(lcm(d,n/d)); fi; od; RETURN(b); end:
mathematica: Table[Plus @@ Map[ EulerPhi[LCM[ #, n/# ]] &, Select[ Range@n, (Mod[n, # ] == 0) &]], {n, 65}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ Sep 30 2006 *)
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 12 2001
